channel.title: Simple Char file error, help? REP
channel.description:
How do I make the Character file the same for everyone.
For example: Name: Owner Password: sfdsdhghdr Energy: (I want this the same for everyone)

item.title: Simple Char file error, help? REP
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote="† Kane †, post:7, topic:401272"][quote author=Coelho link=topic=498335.msg3645542#msg3645542 date=1309342707]
Are you aiming at making energy unlimited? Because whether you like it or not, 2147m will run out one day.
[/quote]
http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20080128050552AAFUL18
That would be a lot of running.[/quote]

Wow. You gotta be smart to figure that out.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Char file error, help? REP
item.dc:creator: @_Kane † Kane †
item.description:
@_Kane wrote:

Find the public int for run energy and replace the value with 2bil.

Example:

public int RunEnergy = 2147000000;

Read full topic
